name: Barraskewda
description: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Propeller Tail
abilities.description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
